links.body: The Legend of Korra—The Art of the Animated Series, Book One: Air

paragraphs.text: Stewart was hired to work on the series as a background painter right after graduating college. Unlike fellow background painter Emily Tetri, who was a big fan of the Avatar series, he did not know the franchise until he got the background test for Korra. He rented the season one box set of Avatar: The Last Airbender, ended up watching all three books in less than a week, and has been a fan since. He also painted the background for The Legend of Korra—The Art of the Animated Series, Book One: Air.

paragraphs.body: 2014: Won an Annie Award for The Legend of Korra (Production Design in an Animated TV/Broadcast Production)
paragraphs.text: 2014: Won an Annie Award for The Legend of Korra (Production Design in an Animated TV/Broadcast Production)
